BlackNightmare:

"Yes"she said sweetly and with a big smile, she sat down in her bed 
and  she invited him to do the same

wrote:
> Malice:
>  
> Malice led the femme to her room, where the door remained open.  
He led her inside then turned to her.
> "What me to stay with you a while longer?" he asked.
>
